sentences.sContent: She tried to blow a grey strand of hair from her eyes.
sentences.sCn: 她试图吹开眼前的一缕白发。

sentences.sContent: The climbers had been stranded by a storm.
sentences.sCn: 这些登山者被暴风雨困住了。

synos.tran: 使搁浅；使陷于困境；弄断；使落后

phrases.pCn: 多股绞合线；钢丝绳股；绞合线；绳索

remMethod.val: 只有一股(strand)绳是站(stand)不起来的

words.tran: 搁浅的；陷于困境的；有…股的（常用来构成复合词）
搁浅（strand的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a single thin piece of thread, wire, hair etc
If you are stranded, you are prevented from leaving a place, for example because of bad weather
